title: Men's Long Sleeve Dress Shirts Regular Fit and Wrinkle Free Stretch Buttown Down Shirt with Pocket
description: SOFT MATERIAL:Super soft and comfortable spandex and polyester fiber. It is breathable and lightweight, wrinkle-resistant and stretchable dress shirt.
QUALITY PERFORMANCE: Details such as breast pocket, collar stayed, adjustable cuffs,seam performance. It is high-performance mens dress shirts with good workmanship, good performance

REGULAR FIT: Our dress shirts is USA standard size, it fits true to color and size in classic men's fashion style. If you are big and tall or have belly fat and broad shoulders, we recommend you to go one size up.

VARIOUS OCCASIONS: This long sleeve dress shirt is suitable for various occasions, such as: casual/wedding/business/office/work/prom/party/concert/club etc, it is also a perfect present for husband, boyfriend, friends and son.
CARE INSTRUCTION: Easy and simple care, hand wash or machine wash in cold water, do not bleach and Iron at low temperature if necessary.
